scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace @dogeswap/contracts-core build && yarn workspace @dogeswap/contracts-periphery build" "yarn workspace @dogeswap/sdk-core build && yarn workspace @dogeswap/v2-sdk build" && yarn workspace @dogeswap/interface build
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach run clean && hardhat clean
scripts.localnet:deploy: concurrently "yarn workspace @dogeswap/contracts-core build" "yarn workspace @dogeswap/contracts-periphery build" && yarn hardhat run --network localhost scripts/run-localnet.ts
scripts.mainnet:deploy: yarn build && yarn hardhat deploy --network mainnet
scripts.testnet:deploy: yarn build && yarn hardhat deploy --network testnet
